title: Cu-doped calcium phosphate supraparticles for bone tissue regeneration
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32839-32851
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04769A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anika Höppel, Olivia Bahr, Regina Ebert, Annette Wittmer, Michael Seidenstuecker, M. Carolina Lanzino, Uwe Gbureck, Sofia Dembski
Antibacterial, biodegradable spray dried Cu-doped CaP supraparticles with high cell viability show great potential as bone substitute materials.
